```{r}
#| output: true
latitude <- 41.477523
longitude <- -81.807216
loc_url <- "https://www.yelp.com/biz/madison-square-lanes-lakewood"
loc_name <- "Madison-Square Lanes"
loc_street <- "1653 Westwood Ave"
loc_city <- "Lakewood, OH 44107"
loc_phone <- "(216) 221-8558"
leaflet(height = "300px") |>
  addTiles() |>
  setView(
    lng = longitude,
    lat = latitude,
    zoom = 15
  ) |>
  addMarkers(
    lng = longitude,
    lat = latitude,
    popup = paste(
      sprintf(
        fmt = "<b><a href='%s' target=_blank>%s</a></b>",
        loc_url,
        loc_name
      ),
      loc_street,
      loc_city,
      loc_phone,
      sep = "<br>"
    ),
    popupOptions = popupOptions(closeButton = FALSE)
  ) |>
  addPopups(
    lng = longitude + 0.00005,
    lat = latitude + 0.0011,
    popup = paste(
      sprintf(
        fmt = "<b><a href='%s' target=_blank>%s</a></b>",
        loc_url,
        loc_name
      ),
      loc_street,
      loc_city,
      loc_phone,
      sep = "<br>"
    ),
    options = popupOptions(closeButton = FALSE)
  )
```
